title: Lelov-Sanz Chasunah Celebration
body: Bnei Brak's 12-hour wedding celebration brings together Lelov and Sanz chasidic dynasties, uniting Rav Ephraim Fishel Motzen's grandson in marriage.

title: Dinner Done 2 Released
body: The Between Carpools team, led by the women who understand real life in the kitchen, is back with Dinner Done 2, the sequel to the bestselling cookbook that transformed dinnertime in kosher homes with over 100,000 copies sold.
